Articles.Content:
Yet another game i stole from the Roblox forums (they have there own forum games), this is similar to Survive That Attack / Corrupt a wish, please enjoy.

Ok, so, a poster states a mutation, and the next poster states a Pro and a Con, and then states yet another mutation. Example:

User#1: Left ear is a gun

User #2: Pro: Defend. con: Suicide XD.| Right arm is a TV remote.

Ok. you know how it works, so i will begin.

Hair is Play-Dough.

Pro: Keep up with the latest hairstyles with ease.

Con: What happens when you go swimming?

Red and blue portals fire from left and right eyes, respectively.

Pro: Portals

Con: lack of vision

Angel wings

Pro: Fly.

Con: You have a bigger chance to meet Weber the Trickster and get Blackmail. (If you play Dokapon Kingdom you'll understand)

Become a Flareon

Pro. Do something

Con. Have no idea what that is XD

Have a head of a starwars droid.

Pro. Do something

Con. Have no idea what that is XD

How dare you insult mah favorite pokemon... (BTW Flareon is my avatar)

Pro: Be a badass.

Con: Get destroyed because Droids suck at fighting.

Become a Flareon.

Pro: Immunity to fire!

Con: Get hurt by water

Chainsaw hands!

Pro: Useful for...ripping stuff?

Cons: No high-fives, no interacting with other stuff without destroying them, accidentaly murdering people.

Nails become...nails....the metal ones...used to...fasten stuff.

Pros: You don't have to see how bad the world is.

Cons: you never exist in the first place.

Can summon Mr. Stay Puft at will.

Pros: Destroy cities!

Cons: "Who ya gonna call?"

Be able to enter other universes.

Pros: EXPLORE!

Cons: No one said there would be an exit.

By the way, Inspector Gadget xD

So that creates the next mutation!

Having your brain turned into a robot-y thing AKA ALL YOUR BRAIN ARE MACHINE

Pro; Cool? Maybe... No.

Con: You have something heavy on your head... (Literally).

Telekinesis.

Pro: You can... Well, control stuff with your mind!

Con: Oh, you'll get so fat with this you'll have no muscles anymore.

No need to sleep.

Pro: PARTY IN THE ROCKET ALL THE TIME!

Con: This night ... So boring ...

Feet are replaced with engines.

Pro: Can fly!

Con: Accidently fly yourself agains stuff.

Controllable hairs(you can use them as hands).

Pros: Can hold more things.

Cons: What happens when you cut it?

Turned into a kerbal.

Pro: Fly rockets, crash rockets, be epic, be brave, and fit through small openings like you were a child.

Con: Sheer stupidity, vulnerability to the Kraken.

Morph into anyone at will, and perfectly imitate them as well.

Pro: You are just like that person. No one will recognize your real appearence!

Con: You run the risk of not able to un-morph and so maybe stuck in that person forever. Besides, you can't control the person.

Immune to all diseases, and can gain immunity from new diseases very quickly.

Pro: Never sick.

Con: Be the last human in a disease pandemic.

Eat anything and not get fat.

Pro: Eat anything and not get fat.

Con: Body unable to store energy.

High level of telomerase ribonucleoprotein (RNP).

Pros: If medicine ever finds a need for a big supply of this stuff, you'll be rich

Cons: Medicine will probably never find a need for a big supply of this stuff.

Have fully functioning and controllable hands and feet that float beside your torso. (In other words, be Rayman)

Pro: You can reach anywhere!

Con: You are more prone to part separation than normal humans.

Running really fast and not get tired.

Pro: Never be late to anything that's IRL and outside your house, and not needing to pay and use transportation.

Con: If you trip and fall while running, your pretty much going to die.

Being able to teleport to anywhere in the solar system.

Pro: Exploration!

Con: You could sneeze and teleport to Venus. Or Jupiter. Or Neptune. Or Pluto. Or.......

Have the most dexterous hands ever.

Pro: Crafting, like in minecraft.

Con: Papercuts are common.

Be able to teleport throughout the solar system, be immune to any and all negative effects of the celestial bodies, and always have a way to return to Earth.
